data.text: @quietcry @VerminSupreme @TheGongShowABC @therealroseanne Sorry, I thought he was commenting on my rap thing where I mentioned Chuck Berry. Yep, I remember original host Chuck Barris - that was a fun show!

@JohnnyArgent @VerminSupreme @TheGongShowABC @therealroseanne Guys it's Chuck Barris. Chuck Berry was the dude who sang Great Balls Of Fire and died in a plane crash with Buddy Holly.

#TheDayTheMusicDied
@quietcry @TheGongShowABC @therealroseanne @JohnnyArgent wow. down the memory hole. censored by the ghost of Chuck Barry, an outrage!
